EmailTemplate.name: 17.IPRout.XLE.Health.N.G.N.18522.Healthcare nurture.Email 3 - Awareness
EmailTemplate.subject: Adapt and transform for real-time healthcare
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Turning technology into healthcare transformation As we move deeper into a digital world, new possibilities are opened for healthcare organizations to change the way they connect and operate.
Leaders are redefining daily practices and developing comprehensive digital strategies to transform the healthcare system.
Watch our webinar, "What It Takes To Become A Digital Master <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2194.Whatittakestobecomeadigitalmaster.html]]>", and learn about transformation strategies employed by digital leaders presented by George Westerman, MIT researcher and author of Leading Digital Turning Technology Into Business Transformation and Rasu Shrestha, Chief Innovation Officer at UPMC. Sincerely,
Cindy Bergevin Head of Healthcare Marketing, Nokia Email: cindy.bergevin@nokia.com <[[mailto:cindy.bergevin@nokia.com]]>
Visit https://networks.nokia.com/healthcare/it <[[https://networks.nokia.com/healthcare/it]]> Connect with us Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
